alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Summit and southwestern Uinta Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles east of Coalville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Summit and southwestern Uinta Counties. This includes Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 50 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
